transcript.text: How are you ?
I'm fine since i've made this move
Guys, we are here today for the second and final part of the fan game provided by Benjamin.
The first part was awesome, and I hope the second will be as cool as the first!
We had fainted after facing many hard trials
and we spawned in this boat
A tape, I have to get the tape!
Ah I can't touch the water it's forbidden ok
I love doing this in real life, i love this game of jumping stones
I think Ben likes this too, that's why he made a game on it
Ok there is no save point, if i lose, we cry
that's all to it
Tabarnak!! (slur from Quebec)
Ben's already messing fucking me in the ass from the get go
Just like that
I apologize for being crude, but i act like this when i'm raging
Besides, i'm crude even when i'm not raging
I'm always like this, so why are you still on my youtube channel
Oh fu-- be nice
We're gonna say a nice word after each death, it's better like this
Silky
Beautiful
Pleasant
Comfortable, comfortable
Fuck yeah! This is paradise, small farm with some greens
I'm gonna snatch this tape, i swear dude
I really want it! I'm fed up
TAAAAPE!!
I'm going to fucking get it
What's this??
Is it a crazy fan's house?
"How to get subsribers" ,  " Question time 1".....
"Pokemon go , the hunt of an expert" , "300K subs" he put some old videos, it's hilarious
"They modeled my house"
That's the part when I called him in the first  video
It's cute
Look! he put the blue thumbs up on every screenshot
I love Ben!
"Remember the way you came until this point"
Remember the way you came until this point
I get it, i have to sort them in chronoligical order, nice one
I think this is it.
By logic, the first one is "300k subs"
The 2nd one is "question time 1"...
The 3rd is the 5 year anniversary
Was this one before pokémon?
Hold up, I looked it up, it was 9 months and two weeks old
Pokemon is from June...
Pokemon was first
I know myself so well! It's a good thing, it's good to have a massive ego
So you know what you did and when you did it. Good.
"Okay dude, listen carefully"
"You're in MY cold room"
"All my  bottles are there"
"So i swear, if you break any of them"
"I will kick your arse"
I need to not spill any bottle
"Oh fuck"
"That was water"
"But I will still kick your arse"
Noooooo
Aww dude!
Commando mission
NO!
"But I will still kick your arse"
Take this beers! Take this motherfucker! Fucking alcoholic!!!
It's hard.
Yes! We did it
Oh f..
"What's going on?"
"My radar is showing  dozens of marks approaching"
"Dude..."
"You're in deep as I am so exterminate all these parasites for me"
I don't want to help you, you've been getting on my nerves
Ooh nice!
Some action
there's a lot of monsters woah!!
It's tough as hell
Defend the turrets ! Without them you'll die
Okay but wait
Look at this, they are all on me!!
Oh shit , this is it! Oh this is it!!!
Oh i'm gonna make it!!
I did it!
Wouah dude, that was awesome!
Yes!! This is done
Hijo de puta
Who wants to try me now ??
"We didn't get off to a good start...."
Yeah, yeah, yeah
"I wanted to thank you for my stock of alcohol"
Yeah, go fuck yourself, yeah
"I know why you came, and i'm gonna get it for you"
"Go on, take your access card and your tape"
"Now fuck off"
Well thank you very much my friend
Ok
"Last week..."
"...Was caught watching a make up tutorial..."
" it was Enjoyphoenix's to make it worse"
What's up, Corentin
"Since then we haven't seen him again"
Some news these are
"It's why i'm going to continue this log on my personal computer"
"Being that i'm on the highest accreditation rank "
"They won't be able to snoop around"
"The password is : AMIXEM"
"All the info that you will need will be in there"
OK! So, password : AMIXEM
We need to find the damn computer
Come on, let's go
Oh, I think this is the final straw
We're gonna find jumbo (his cat)
This is going to be great
He scared the crap out of me, dude! Holy shit
It looks like...
Hulk made love with Hellboy
It's very weird
Okay, so we're back at the very beginning of the game
We need to find the computer
THE LAMP!!!!
It's super mad
The lamp is actually angry
Look at it, really
What's in these rooms?
That's the office, professor doctor LANGAGNE BENJAMIN
Can i turn the PC on?
Ah ! It needs to be plugged in
There!
Okay , Password : AMIXEM ,  i'm through !
Log : We don't have any animals available, le gouvernment apparently doesn't have the time to wait any longer
The vaccine has been inserted into 24 human subjects
I need to focus on their healing, but for that i will need a test subject that reacts positively to the vaccine
A cat fell from the trap door today. I'm going to try to test the the vaccine on it
It's Jumbo!! No don't test it on Jumbo !
All my samples have been stolen, Jumbo disappeared, 12 people were found strangled dead
People are putting the blame on a lamp
What's happening here?
I saw the lamp, it strangled one of my colleagues right under my nose
Damn
The US ARMY are holding Squeezie captive, they know that Jumbo is the antidote
If they get a hold of it, the world will never be cured
They are going to use a machine operated by memory, programmed to find the cat
And study Squeezie all over
So that was the first chapter, that's what was happening
He will find Jumbo and save the world, that is if he is capable
This is my last message, farewell
Oh Damn!
It's gonna blow (x2)
Wooooh sorry!
Oh i'm fine i got through, it's closed now
I was scared
Okay, this way
"Squeezie, over here"
"Good God you found us"
"It's got a hold of Jumbo"
NO
No (with some fake sobbing)
"Oh no it's sending it to the surface"
"You need to stop it"
"To climb all the way you have to activate the main generator"
"Find the missing pieces, and pull the lever to start it up"
Okay we just need gas and a cog thing
OKay friend don't worry i'm going to find the gas container and the cog
Aw shit it sent it's minions in, the cunt
It's hard to aim, fucking shit
Fucking shit lamp!
Need a cog and a gas thing, quickly !
Yes! Done!
Now we need the cog and we're good
There! I got it
We made it without calling Ben ! Incredible
Shit! We need the lever too
There are so many
I got it (x2)
Yes!! We can finally kick this lamp's butt and finish this for once and for all
Aaaaaaah i'm shooting it
It's dead!
"Marvellous"
It's dead!!!
I'm coming for you dude it's over! The suffering of playing this rage game is over
" All we need to do is get Jumbo on the surface now"
Ok let's go ! Jumbo! Jumbo kitty !!
It's over
Ooooh my god
This story wasn't a walk in a park
Aint going to lie, it gave me a hard time, aint going to lie
Dude, Benjamin, thank you so much man
I don't know if you realise this but
It takes A LOT of time and investment to make a game like this
We're gonna call him and tell him that it was great!!
I'm going to prank him, watch me
(Ben) : Hello, yes?
Hey man, i'm stuck again
(Ben) : Where are you stuck?
It's fake ! I finished the game (lol it's a prank bro, joey salads could never)
(Ben) : Oh yeah ! He did it
Yeah i know i pranked you on broadcast
Thank you, it was awesome, Really
I roamed around for two hours because i'm bad at this
(Ben) : Thank you, but 2 hours was the approx time needed
Counting the fact that i'm really bad
(Ben) : Yeah and you didn't need my help either, it was perfect
Yes, great of course
(Ben) : I'm happy that you liked it at least
I really liked it! Good job, people are congratulating you i can hear them across the camera
And thank you very much
And i'll see you i don't know when for another game or something
(Ben) : Maybe, maybe a third chapter, who knows
Sending you kisses Ben
(Ben) : Me too!!
See you xoxo
Ciao, peace
It's been months since I don't say peace anymore, go it?
I hope you all liked the game and that it reminded you of the 2014-2015 times
The question time era, it's really when the lamp and Jumbo appeared in all the videos, to be honest
It's obviously changed, but it's funny to see what he did with those characters that we created back then
Thanks again Ben , thank you for watching and i'll see you next time for another video
See you!
